The test_008 leaf shows **moderate to prominent pustule density with visible yellow-orange coloration and chlorosis**, which aligns most closely with the **Moderately_Susceptible_MS** severity level description: "rust pustules are moderately dense, scattered but covering about 15-25% of the leaf surface.
